charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] climbed up a
rigorous mountain trail during [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] travels.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1101_0200_:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] trudged toward the top of the mountain,
hoping for a good view of Pasio. That’s where
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] ran into Skyla and Swanna.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_0400_: Are you on your way up the mountain?
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0401_0600_:
I thought so! I figured you were heading that
way if you were on this trail!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0402_0800_:
I thought so! I figured you were heading that
way if you were on this trail!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_0900_:
I was looking down on the trail while Swanna 
and I were flying overhead, and I realized...
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0401_1200_: But don’t worry! Swanna and I are here now!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0302_1300_: Yeah, it’s a lot harder than it looked.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0402_1400_: But don’t worry! Swanna and I are here now!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_1500_:
If it’s getting too tough to keep hiking, 
you can just fly to the top!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_1600_: Looks like Swanna’s all for it, too!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_1700_: So, how about it? Let’s go for a nice flight!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_2200_: Thanks, Swanna. That was fun, wasn’t it?
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_2700_:
She got stronger by always flying next to me
whenever I flew my cargo plane.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_2800_:
Hanging out with her made me realize how fun
it is to do things with your Pokémon—
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_2900_: and how fun it is to get help from them!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_3000_: That’s why I’m really glad I came to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_3100_:
Trainers and Pokémon all help each other out 
to make great Pokémon battles together.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_3200_:
And you can make better memories if you share
them with Pokémon and other people!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_3300_:
What I’m trying to say is that it made me really
appreciate working hard together!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_3400_:
I’d love to have more Pokémon battles with you
and share more memories together!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0401_3600_: Great! It’s a unanimous decision, then!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0302_3700_: Yeah, I feel the same way.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0402_3800_: Great! It’s a unanimous decision, then!
